summary: This document is a summary of account balances and transactions for a Deutsche Bank account from December 1, 2015, to December 31, 2015. It details incoming and outgoing funds, including significant transfers to and from various entities, and provides a snapshot of the account's financial activity during that month.

persons.name: Jj Litchford
persons.context: Jj Litchford is mentioned as a contact for personal assistance regarding the account.

persons.context: Terje Roed Larsen is referenced in connection with a transfer to the United Nations Federal Credit Union.

persons.name: Cecile R De Jongh
persons.context: Cecile R De Jongh is mentioned as the recipient of an outgoing transfer to First Bank, Puerto Rico.

persons.name: Debra R Black
persons.context: Debra R Black is mentioned in connection with an incoming transfer from Apollo Management.

persons.name: Benjamin Rothschild
persons.context: Benjamin Rothschild is referenced as the recipient of an incoming transfer.

events.description: An incoming transfer of approximately $14.99 million from Benjamin Rothschild was recorded.

events.title: Incoming Transfer from Apollo Management

events.title: Outgoing Transfer to Cecile R De Jongh

keyFacts: The document summarizes account balances and transactions for December 2015.
Significant incoming transfers include $10 million from Apollo Management and approximately $15 million from Benjamin Rothschild.
Outgoing transfers include $200,000 to Cecile R De Jongh and $250,000 to an unspecified entity.
The account had a starting balance of approximately $73 million and an ending balance of approximately $110 million.
There are multiple references to transfers involving large sums of money, indicating significant financial activity.
